Contrastive Learning for Trace Clustering

contrastive_clustering.Rd

Use contrastive learning to cluster similar calcium traces.

Usage

contrastive_clustering(
  traces,
  n_clusters = 5,
  temperature = 0.1,
  epochs = 100,
  ...
)

Arguments

traces

Matrix of calcium traces (cells x time)

n_clusters

Number of clusters (default: 5)

temperature

Temperature parameter for contrastive loss (default: 0.1)

epochs

Number of training epochs (default: 100)

...

Additional arguments

Value

Cluster assignments and learned representations

On this page
